Course.Name: Computer Org and Assembly Lang
Course.Description: An introduction to computer organization, use of assembly language programming, basic instruction sets, arithmetic and logical operations, addressing modes and macro definition. Several computer programming projects are included.
Course.Restrictions: dnu-MED in Educational Admin, MPA in Public Administration, Bus. Admin -Accelerated online.
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, CS Instruction Fee - LU
